Green Chili Indian Cuisine 1 Nicholas Rd # 49 , Framingham MA 01701 map (508) 877-4670 0 Recommendations Green Chili, located in the Pinefield Plaza, serves an eclectic mix of all-day breakfast, South and North Indian Cuisine. All kinds of meats,Veggies,Seafoods many more items available such as:All kinds of Dosa(Crepes) all type of Uttaphoms(Pancakes) all types of Curries,all kinds of appetizers, also hotdogs, Wraps, Indian all kinds of Pizzas Sandwhices,home made drinks plus other soft drinks are here, Kids meals,8 different brand Ice Creams,Specially Meat products Halal, food preparation infront of you from the Counter, All food are custom made food from scratch: order through Menu,we don't have Buffet if you have patience to wait please visit our website&come down give it a try your best interested you will feel the flavor,texture,quality&quanties not like other restaurants.Fast food dine in&dine out Open Now Monday through Saturday 10 am to 10 pm. Sunday and Holidays 12 pm to 10 pm. Additional Info: EXCELLENT FOOD, Excellent Staff, we have great food, good times, warm friendly smiles and LOW prices waiting for you to experience! I like to introduce myself that my name is Anthony Gomes. 49 years Green Chili Indian Cuisine Menu Green Chili Indian Food Menu Items view all
El Pelon Taquieria Restaurant 2197 Commonwealth Avenue , Brighton MA 02135-3853 map (617) 779-9090 0 Recommendations El Pelon Taqueria serves authentic Mexican street food in a casual fun friendly environment El Pelon Taqueria serves authentic Mexican street food in the heart of Boston, Massachusetts. We strive to offer our menu items at extremely affordable prices, prepared with fresh ingredients daily . Our menu consists of more than just burritos, we have award winning fish tacos and other Mexican specialties such as Enchiladas, Tortas and handmade Tamales. We provide fast and friendly service, allowing for quick, convenient take-out or dine in from 11am to 11pm seven days a week. Catering available Additional Info: Winner of Boston Magazine"Best Burrito"2011 Living wages paid to our staff with paid time off and health insurance priority to small local vendorspriority to small local vendors Order Online Catering Delivery

Malone Catering 42 rockwood Rd , Norfolk MA 02056 map 617-899-0177 0 Recommendations We provide outstanding food&service for: weddings, parties, bar mitzvahs, meetings, reunions, corporate outings, concessions, bridal&baby showers We offer a wide array of catering services; Wonderful drop of lunches and dinners, cooked to order stations full service banquets and buffets. We have catered hundreds of; weddings, bar mitzvahs, bereavements, reunions, office parties, meetings, cook outs, graduation parties and celebrations of all kinds. We also offer food&beverage management service. We have been food&beverage management service and exclusive caterers to: Norfolk Golf Club \ Westwood, Mass. Needham Golf Club \ Needham, Mass. Sharon Country Club Sharon, Mass. Event Planning Corporate Catering Contract Food Service Management view all
Subway 1 Auston Rd , Harwich MA 02645 map (508) 432-1280 0 Recommendations Subway open year round 7 am to 9 pm. Catering Lunch Dinner
The Den Mattapan MA 02126 map 1 Recommendation hide I love their food!!!! Rayya Dennis Tired of cooking on the weekends? Tired of the same ol' fast food? Do you want a satisfying meal for a great price? Let us do the cooking for you... Here's how it works...
We create a menu each week with a variety of sides, meats, and dessert for Saturday and Sunday. You can see the menu on our facebook fan page or we can email it to you each week on Friday. Select your meal choices from the menu and place your order at 617-433-7553. Pick up or delivery to Dorchester, Mattapan, Roxbury, and the South End.
To join our email list send an email to TheDen617@gmail.com ... PRICE: $10.00 - $15.00 Depending on the menu and will include a beverage. Desserts are $1.00 - $2.00. Kahlua Cupcakes
Donna's Love Bites Dessert Catering Brockton MA 02302 map 0 Recommendations Donna's LoveBites is a Dessert Catering Company- catering both intimate and large events. DONNA'S recipes for her unique desserts have been honed to perfection over years of tasting and improving upon every morsel that she puts her name on. The ingredients are natural and handpicked with great emphasis on the end result.
WHEN Donna's Love Bites caters a special occasion not only is the display a wonderful vision, but each special treat tastes as good as it looks. Consider how important this is when you want to make a meaningful offering of dessert to friends, relatives or colleagues.
Holiday or Gift Trays of cookies and brownies are also available. Gift Baskets can be specifically ordered to meet your client's or friends tastes. Sweetheart Cakes cupcakes Tiny Tarts
Cold Stone Creamery 158 Colony Place Road , Plymouth MA 02360-7233 map 0 Recommendations We use the highest quality ingredients in preparing your custom ice cream or frozen yogurt creation, to smoothies, Shakes, Cakes, Cupcakes, and More. If it has anything to do with ice cream, it has everything to do with Cold Stone Creamery. From unique ice cream or frozen yogurt creations to smoothies, cakes, cupcakes and shakes - nobody serves up the ultimate indulgence like Cold Stone. It starts with using the highest quality ingredients and ends with our signature process for preparing your custom creation on a frozen granite stone.
